item.title: About
item.description: Ciao! I am Damiano, aka DeadCode. Infosec dude, based in Rome, working in cybersec since 2015. I am involved in penetration testing and ethical hacking tasks on a daily basis. Cybersec Hackaton lover. Badges addicted ðŸ¥¸ Check my blog for my last updates about my works, my life, things I like and activities I enjoy. My git repo links are somewhere in this site, you can check there about my projects.
